articles.description: Britain’s voters at the 1974 Eurovision Song Contest feared Abba would be Olivia Newton-John’s Waterloo.So, according to Abba’s Björn Ulvaeus, they sabotaged his band’s efforts to win.Ulvaeus said
articles.content:
Britains voters at the 1974 Eurovision Song Contest feared Abba would be Olivia Newton-Johns Waterloo.
So, according to Abbas Björn Ulvaeus, they sabotaged his bands efforts to win.

articles.author: Sean O'grady, Brian Gallagher
articles.title: Carrie Underwood exudes glamour in a shimmering sheer beige dress at Country Music Awards - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former American Idol star, 38, ensured all eyes were on her with her head-turning outfit at the star-studded event in Nashville on Sunday.
articles.content:
She teamed up with the iconic CeCe Winans to sing a medley of gospel hymns at the Academy of Country Music Awards.
